meta.title: User Guide - AIHub
meta.description: Learn how to use AIHub effectively - search tools, filter by category, save favorites, and submit your own AI tools.
meta.keywords: user guide, tutorial, how to use, help

title: User Guide
subtitle: Get the most out of AIHub with our comprehensive guide

searching.title: Searching for AI Tools
searching.description: Find the perfect AI tool for your needs with our powerful search functionality

steps.useSearchBar: Use the search bar at the top of the page to enter keywords related to the tool you're looking for
steps.useFilters: Apply category filters to narrow down results to specific types of AI tools
steps.sortResults: Sort results by popularity, rating, or newest additions to find trending tools

categories.title: Browsing Categories
categories.description: Explore AI tools organized by category for easy discovery

steps.browseCategories: Browse through our curated categories like 'Chatbots', 'Image Generation', 'Code Assistants', and more
steps.filterByCategory: Click on any category to view all tools within that category
steps.exploreCollections: Check out our themed collections for hand-picked tool recommendations

saving.title: Saving Favorites
saving.description: Save your favorite tools for quick access later

steps.clickBookmark: Click the bookmark icon on any tool card to add it to your favorites
steps.accessSaved: Access your saved tools from the 'Bookmarks' section in your profile
steps.manageBookmarks: Organize and remove bookmarks from your collection anytime

rating.title: Rating Tools
rating.description: Share your experience and help others discover great tools

steps.selectRating: Click the star rating on any tool page to rate it from 1-5 stars
steps.shareExperience: Leave a detailed review describing your experience with the tool
steps.helpOthers: Your ratings help other users find the best AI tools for their needs

submission.title: Submitting Tools
submission.description: Contribute to our directory by submitting new AI tools

steps.clickSubmit: Navigate to the 'Submit Tool' page from the main menu
steps.fillDetails: Fill in the tool details including name, description, category, and website URL
steps.awaitReview: Our team will review your submission and add approved tools within 24-48 hours

sharing.title: Sharing Tools
sharing.description: Share interesting AI tools with your network

steps.copyLink: Copy the direct link to any tool page using the share button
steps.socialMedia: Share directly to Twitter, Facebook, or other social platforms
steps.embedTool: Embed tool cards on your website using our embed code generator

3.description: Subscribe to get weekly updates on new tools, trending AI news, and exclusive content

0.question: Is AIHub free to use?
0.answer: Yes, AIHub is completely free. You can browse, search, and access all AI tools without any charge.

1.question: How are tools reviewed and verified?
1.answer: Our team manually reviews each submission to ensure tool quality, legitimacy, and relevance before adding it to our directory.

2.question: Can I submit my own AI tool?
2.answer: Absolutely! We welcome submissions from developers and AI enthusiasts. Use our submission form and we'll review it promptly.
